17 def makePhoto(parameters=None):
18  MAX_PHOTO_COUNT = 3
19  photo_count = 0
20  def callback_image(data.data):
21  if photo_count == MAX_PHOTO_COUNT:
22  image = convert.str2ndarray(data.data)
23  cv2.imwrite('photo', image)
24  else:
25  photo_count += 1
26  sub = rospy.Subscriber('audio_capture', String, callback_image)
27  while photo_count < MAX_PHOTO_COUNT:
28  time.sleep(0.1)
29  sub.unregister()
